alert.note: Alert for Jack; Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:58AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jack and northeastern Palo Pinto Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Windthorst to 7 miles northeast of Possum Kingdom Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksboro, Graford, Bryson, Newport, Fort Richardson State Park, Lake Bridgeport, Possum Kingdom Lake, Perrin, Salesville, Cundiff, Jermyn, Lost Creek Reservoir, Gibtown, Joplin, Bartons Chapel, Wizard Wells, Vineyard, Oran, Antelope and Postoak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas.
